Bluemix Config Parser (Java)

When using Bluemix (CloudFoundry), services configuration are read by parsing the JSON from VCAP_SERVICES environment variable. This is a handy util library for parsing Bluemix VCAP_SERVICES configurations JSON. Common configs classess are provided so itâ€™ll even work with auto-completion on your favorite IDE. No more messy JSON config parsing!
